## CSS Custom Properties

| Name              | Description                            |
| ----------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `--border-color`  | Border color of the menu item divider  |
| `--margin-bottom` | Bottom margin of the menu item divider |
| `--margin-top`    | Top margin of the menu item divider    |
